protocol.text: Data was extracted from the images scanned with GC3000 G7 using the Affymetrix Expression Console v1.1 software. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 ABS_CALL =  DETECTION P-VALUE =
Seedlings were grown for five days under ideal growth condition
Seedlings were vertically grown on one-half strength Murashige and Skoog media
QIAGEN RNeasy Plant kit was used to extract total RNA
RNA was labeled using Ambion MessageAmp Biotin II-Enhanced IVT kit. 14 hour IVT reaction at 37C.

Ten microgram of aRNA was hybridized to the ATH-1 Affymetrix expression array at 45C for 16 hours in Affymetrix 640 hybridization oven. Hybridization cocktail was prepared according to protocols provided in the Affymetrix Expression Analysis Technical Manual.
Gene Chip was scanned on Affymetrix GC3000 G7 scanner using the Affymetrix Command Console v2.0 software.
